DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN : Prospective 3 Arm Randomized control trial . PURPOSE : To compare three commonly use contemporary bearing Total Hip Arthroplasty ( THA ) . In addition , evaluate safety effectiveness G7 Cups Echo BiMetric Stem THA . OUTCOME MEASURES : Osteolysis , clinical outcome , patient satisfaction , intraoperative/surgical data , implant positioning , survivor ship , adverse event . POPULATION : 360 hip ( 240 CT scan analysis osteolysis ) . ELIGIBILITY : Patients meet inclusion exclusion criterion define protocol . DURATION : All patient follow 3 month , 1 , 2 , 5 , 7 10 year postoperatively . Assuming enrollment complete 18 month . The total study duration 11.5 year . STUDY GROUPS/TREATMENTS Group 1 - G7 Metal-on-Polyethylene ( MoP ) ( Arcom XL ) + Echo BiMetric Group 2 - G7 Metal-on-Polyethylene ( MoP ) ( E1 ) + Echo BiMetric Group 3 - G7 Ceramic-on-Ceramic ( CoC ) + Echo BiMetric The study 's primary efficacy endpoint include difference osteolytic volume 5 year postoperatively measure Computertomografi ( CT ) scan .
